condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :F.A. Schedule 2, Section II, B.1;P.A. Schedule, Section II, B.1 | Description :GoM and ESCOM shall maintain orcause to be maintained a financial management system in accordance with the provisions of Section 4.09 of the General Conditions. |Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :F.A. Schedule 2, Section II, B.2; | Description :GoM will prepare and furnish to the Association not later thanforty five (45) days after the end of each calendar quarter, interim unaudited financial reports for the Project covering thequarter | Frequency :Quarterly

Finance Agreement :F.A. Schedule 2, Section II, B.3; | Description :GoM shall have the project's Financial Statements audited,covering all project components. Each audit of the Financial Statements shall cover the period of one fiscal year of GoM. Theaudited Financial Statements for each such period shall be furnished to the Association not later than six months after the end ofsuch period. | Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :P.A. Schedule, Section II, B.2 | Description :ESCOM shall have its corporate financial statements audited byindependent auditors | Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :P.A. Schedule, Section IV, A.1 | Description :ESCOM will maintain a ratio of total operating revenues to totaloperating expenditures of not less than 1.0 | Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :P.A. Schedule, Section IV, A.2 | Description :ESCOM will maintain a ratio of current assets to currentliabilities of not less than 1.0 | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :P.A. Schedule, Section IV, A.3 | Description :ESCOM will ensure that the estimated free cash flows from itsoperating activities shall be at least 1.0 times the estimated maximum debt service requirements for any such Fiscal Year on allits debt | Frequency :Yearly
